scripts.build: docker run -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 npm install sharp
scripts.deploy: cp ../shared/constants.js . && zip -r -X ../imageResizer.zip * && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name carpedalan-west --zip-file fileb://imageResizer.zip --profile carpedev --region us-west-2
